name: INPaymentRecord
desc: Detailed information about a financial transaction made between two users.

items.name: init?(payee: INPerson?, payer: INPerson?, currencyAmount: INCurrencyAmount?, paymentMethod: INPaymentMethod?, note: String?, status: INPaymentStatus, feeAmount: INCurrencyAmount?)
items.desc: Initializes a payment record with the specified payment details.

items.name: init?(payee: INPerson?, payer: INPerson?, currencyAmount: INCurrencyAmount?, paymentMethod: INPaymentMethod?, note: String?, status: INPaymentStatus)
items.desc: Initializes a payment record with the specified payment details.

items.name: var status: INPaymentStatus
items.desc: The current status of the financial transaction.

items.name: var currencyAmount: INCurrencyAmount?
items.desc: The type of currency to transfer and the amount to transfer.

items.name: var feeAmount: INCurrencyAmount?
items.desc: The total amount of any fees added to the payment record.

items.name: var paymentMethod: INPaymentMethod?
items.desc: The payment method used to supply the funds.

items.name: var note: String?
items.desc: A description of the payment to send.
